executable.title: Detects Nuclei
executable.description: Detects nuclei in a whole-slide image
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the HistomicsTK project.

double-vector.name: reference_mu_lab
double-vector.label: Reference Mean LAB
double-vector.description: Mean of reference image in LAB color space for Reinhard color normalization

double-vector.name: reference_std_lab
double-vector.label: Reference Stddev LAB
double-vector.description: Standard deviation of reference image in LAB color space for Reinhard color normalization

double.name: foreground_threshold
double.label: Foreground Intensity Threshold
double.description: Intensity value to use as threshold to segment foreground in nuclear stain image

double.name: min_radius
double.label: Minimum Radius
double.description: Minimum nuclear radius (used to set min sigma of the multiscale LoG filter)

double.name: max_radius
double.label: Maximum Radius
double.description: Maximum nuclear radius (used to set max sigma of the multiscale LoG filter)

double.name: local_max_search_radius
double.label: Local Max Search Radius
double.description: Local max search radius used for detection seed points in nuclei

double.name: min_nucleus_area
double.label: Minimum Nucleus Area
double.description: Minimum area that each nucleus should have

region.name: analysis_roi
region.label: Analysis ROI
region.description: Region of interest within which the analysis should be done. Must be a four element vector in the format "left, top, width, height" in the space of the base layer. Default value of "-1, -1, -1, -1" indicates that the whole image should be processed.

double.name: analysis_mag
double.label: Analysis Magnification
double.description: The magnification at which the analysis should be performed.

double.name: min_fgnd_frac
double.label: Minimum foreground fraction
double.description: The minimum amount of foreground that must be present in a tile for it to be analyzed

string.name: scheduler_address
string.label: Scheduler Address
string.description: Address of the dask scheduler in the format '127.0.0.1:8786', Default value = 'null' sets up a cluster on the local machine
